DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of G5® Mobile Continuous Glucose Monitoring System Accuracy When Using an Automated Applicator vs. a Manual Sensor Applicator
DOC.brief_title: G5® Mobile Continuous Glucose Monitoring System Automated vs. Manual Sensor Applicator
DOC.detailed_description: The objective of the study is to demonstrate the performance, i.e. efficacy of the G5x System with the automated applicator is no worse than that of the commercial Dexcom G4 TM PLATINUM Continuous Glucose Monitoring System (G4 System) with the manual applicator.
DOC.criteria: Ages 2 or older Diagnosis of Type 1 diabetes or Type 2 diabetes Willing to participate in a clinic session involving venous sampling for evaluation of study end point Use of acetaminophen Known allergy to medicalgrade adhesives Pregnancy Hematocrit outside specification of the studyassigned blood glucose meter
